projects.title: DT BTP Administration
projects.description:
	Supporting the implementation of the Business Technology Platform (BTP) at Deutsche Telekom, w.r.t. the Administrator activities at the Global Account and subaccount level, including the subaccount creation, users, role collections, roles & trust configuration & management, adding entitlements & subscriptions, quality management (QM), optimising the billing & structure.
	Configured CTMS for transportation of IFlows and other non-ABAP BTP developments.
	Use of Agile methodology with Jira.
	Liased with clients on a regular basis.

contributors.headline: PMP-Certified | SAP BTP | HANA | Steampunk | AWS | ABAP | OO-ABAP | ABAP-HANA | Machine Learning (Python) | SQL | Javascript | Groovyscript | BPC | BW | German (C1) | English

projects.title: DT GIWA
projects.description:
	Designing & developing a UI5 application along with its Database Architecture using ReSTful Application Programming (RAP) model with ABAP Cloud / Steampunk using ABAP Development Tools (ADT) on Eclipse in parallel with Fiori Elements on Business Application Studio (BAS) to bring together the disintegrated portals at Deutche Telekom (DT) under a single source of truth portal by restructuring the logic, by following the Agile Methodology. 
	Transported Steampunk objects across different Steampunk ABAP environments within the global account using the Software Components.
	Configured Gitlab as the repository behind Business Application Studio (BAS) Developments.
	Liased with clients on a regular basis.

contributors.headline: PMP-Certified | SAP BTP | HANA | Steampunk | AWS | ABAP | OO-ABAP | ABAP-HANA | Machine Learning (Python) | SQL | Javascript | Groovyscript | BPC | BW | German (C1) | English

projects.title: DT Invoice2Cash
projects.description:
	Established push/pull SFTP connections between BTP & AWS, between 2 AWS accounts, and between AWS and 3rd party partner systems using the SSH/RSA key pairs. 
	Created an IFlow involving Groovyscript for the purposes of SFTP connection, its storage in Data Store and sending it further for processing within ABAP Steampunk.
	Transported Steampunk objects across different Steampunk ABAP environments within the global account using the Software Components.
	Configured CTMS for transportation of IFlows and other non-ABAP BTP developments.
	Configured AWS account for usage as an SFTP Server between BTP and the various 3rd party clients, involving the configuration of EC2, AWS Transfer Family, S3, Event Bridge, Lambda Functions using Python, IAM Users/Roles/Policies and checking of logs and events using Cloud Watch and Cloud Trail, intermittently with the help of Command Line Interface (CLI), whenever essential.
	Liased with clients on a regular basis.

projects.title: Industry Template System Comparison (Model COmpany)
projects.description:
     Implementation of Schema, Namespaces, static & dynamic Tables (with primary & foreign keys) & 
Procedures, Functions, Sequences, Triggers, Roles, SQL & Calculation Views, Table Types, Cloud 
Connectors, Destinations, and XSUAA, Connectivity & Destination Services requiring SAP HANA (up to 
HANA 2.0 SPS 04) & Cloud Foundry (Web IDE & Database Explorer), along with Regular Expressions. 
•     Analyzed the requirements, & designed the Database Architecture for the Project 
•     Created a custom Hierarchy network using Hierarchy Scalar, Generation & Composite functions, with 
optimizations using Regular Expressions (RegEx) & latest HANA releases of MAP_MERGE, 
MAP_REDUCE, in-built libraries, SQL Script Code Analysis, etc.
•	Push & Retrieve Code between CF & GitHub.
•	Create OSS Incidents for the issues with HANA 2.0 & Cloud Foundry.
•	Gather & Lead the project Team to develop highly generic artifacts for reuse across multiple projects with proper documentation.
•	Create Sprint-Tasks for all the resources, to be uploaded on Azure Devops, to track the work, along with conducting Scrum Calls

projects.description:

The dynamic Selection Screen displayed the progress of the background/foreground steps, along with a button for each step leading to respective SPRO steps screen for manual modifications, if required.

•	Developed a utility FM to read/write multiple sheets of excel.
•	Developed a utility FM to read/update Maintenance Views directly via Code.
•	Developed several highly generic & reusable artifacts for multiple phases of the project using RTTS.
•	Lead a team of 5 resources with quick & timely completion of the deliverables
•	Gather & Lead the project Team to develop highly generic artifacts for reuse across multiple projects with proper documentation.
•	Create Sprint-Tasks for all the resources, to be uploaded on Azure Devops, to track the work, along with conducting Scrum Calls

projects.description:

•	Gather & Lead the project Team (3 Resources) to develop highly generic artifacts for reuse across multiple projects with proper documentation.
•	Create Sprint-Tasks for all the resources, to be uploaded on Azure Devops, to track the work, along with conducting Scrum Calls

projects.title: Daily Supply & Demand (DSD) (Greenfield S/4 HANA Implementation)  - Kirin
projects.description:
SAP Modules: ABAP, OO-ABAP, ABAP on HANA, MM 
Tasks & Responsibilities:
	Development of Standard Dialogue Programs, Classes, Interfaces, Function Groups, Function Modules, Tables, Structures, Table Types, Data Elements, CDS Views, AMDPs, ALVs, Screens & Sub-Screens using Module Pools, Table Controls, TabStrips, Containers, BOPF etc. requiring SAP ABAP (OOPS, RICEF, DDIC, etc.) & SAP ABAP on HANA.
•	Developed SAP Standard Program under a Namespace containing multiple Screens and Sub-Screens to create an Interactive UI for creation/deletion/updating of Material Master Data and its related components. The Program utilized TabStrip and Editable Table Control with Dynamic Number of Columns with Dynamic Names, with functionality to Add/Delete/Copy rows, & disabling of specific Rows based on Push Buttons, and non-editable ALVs with Dynamic Number of Columns divided using a Container, and with data being dynamically updated and fetched from BOPF, based on Legacy Tables without UUIDs, and containing Associations, Actions, Determinations, Validations, & Queries, & Parameterized CDS View with Associations and Code Pushdown, based on selection from a dropdown list using VRM. Respective Tables, Structures, Tables Types and Data Elements were created as per need.
	Adhered to SAP Best Practices in all the deliverables, using New ABAP Syntax, Code Inspector, ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC) & internal SAP standards.

projects.title: Parivartan (Onshore, Client-facing) (Greenfield S/4 HANA Implementation) - Dilip Buildcon
projects.description:
SAP Modules: ABAP, OO-ABAP, ABAP on HANA, SD, MM, WM, PS, HR, etc. 
Tasks & Responsibilities:
	Development on ALV Reports, Smart Forms, BAPIs, Enhancements, Tables, Structures, Table Types, Data Elements, CDS Views, IDA-ALVs etc. requiring SAP ABAP/HANA.
•	Developed IDA-ALV Report on top of Parametrized CDS View with Joins to fetch Customer Master Data for SAP SD.
•	Developed 2-level Drill-Down ALV Report with Pop-Ups for SAP SD Billing Document Data.
•	Developed Smart Forms based on Bar Codes, Items & Sub Items, letters, etc. for SAP MM/SD/HR. 
•	Developed PS-based program to display ALV and E-Mail an excel attachment from SAP Mailbox.
•	Implemented PS-based BAPIs, to be run in Foreground/Background, using Logical Path Creation.
•	Enhanced Standard Structure & corresponding LDB-based Standard Report for a PS-based ALV report.
	Interacted with the Client to understand the functional requirements, and provide technical designs & deliverables.
	Adhered to SAP Best Practices in all the deliverables.

projects.title: Namaste (Greenfield S/4 HANA Implementation) - Nadro
projects.description:
SAP Modules: ABAP, OO-ABAP, ABAP on HANA, MM, WM, etc. 
Tasks & Responsibilities:
	Development of ALV Reports, Smart Forms, Tables, Structures, Table Types, CDS Views, AMDPs etc. & implementation of BAPIs requiring SAP ABAP (OOOPS, RICEF, DDIC, etc.) & SAP ABAP on HANA
•	Developed an Editable ALV Report on top of a CDS View with Joins to fetch Plant data from MATDOC table, and store in a Custom Table, with Custom ALV Export to PDF, Excel & Text files.
•	Developed an ALV Report on top of a parameterized CDS View to display 2 ALV Reports one below the other, with the second containing the Line Items of the one above it by Splitting a Container.
•	Developed Smart Form to fetch Order details from various tables and print it.
	Used ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC), Extended Code Check & Code Inspector on all Code Deliverables.
	Creation of Technical Design Documents (TDD), and creation of CharM transport requests.

projects.title: Manufacturing Price Forecasting - Unilever (Brownfield S/4 HANA Implementation)
projects.description:
An SAP Financials project on Price Forecasting for SAP BPC 10.1 on S/4 HANA Migration from SAP BPC 7.5.

SAP Modules: ABAP, OO-ABAP, ABAP on HANA, BW, BPC, PP, etc.
Tasks & Responsibilities:
	Developed & Debugged BAdIs, Classes, ALV Reports, Events, Tables, Structures, CDS Views, Transformation Program, BW Start Routine, etc. requiring SAP ABAP (OOPS, RICEF, DDIC, etc.)
•	Created several BPC-based BADI implementations to write data in the BW Cubes from Flat Files (CSV), perform analytical calculations, & & export Excel and CSV files to local desktop or via E-Mail.
•	Developed multiple Drill-Down ALV Reports using CDS View with Joins, with event handling & custom GUI Status to download data for Material BOM for SAP PP.
	Developed DSOs, Info Objects, Info Cubes, Transformation Rules, DTPs, Data Sources, Info Packages & Process Chains along with working with the other related concepts requiring workable knowledge of SAP BW.
	Developed & Tested Transformation Files, Data Manager Packages, Logic Scripts requiring workable knowledge of SAP BPC, & its MS Excel EPM Add-In.
	Created Technical Design Documents (TDD) & Unit Test documents.
	Translated functional specifications into technical specifications, followed by Design, Code, & Transportation of objects using SAP Transport Management System (STMS) Tool.
	Interacted & collaborated with Client & teams across multiple organizations around the globe throughout the Project Life Cycle in all the phases of SDLC, & ensured project completion within the allotted timelines and budget.
	Worked in compliance with the programming and documentation standards, along with SLIN checks.

•	Developed Smart Forms to fetch Order details from various tables and print it.
	Development of DSOs, Info Objects, Info Cubes, Transformation Rules, DTPs, Data Sources, Info Packages & Process Chains etc. requiring workable knowledge of SAP BW.
	Development of Transformation Files, Data Manager Packages, Logic Scripts requiring workable knowledge of SAP BPC, & its MS Excel EPM Add-In.
	Creation of Technical Design Documents (TDD) & Unit Test documents.
	Translation of functional specifications into technical specifications, followed by Design, Code, code checks (ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC), Extended Code Check / SLIN & Code Inspector), & Transportation of objects using SAP Transport Management System (STMS) Tool or CharM transport requests.
	Interaction & collaboration with Client & teams across multiple organizations & countries throughout the Project Life Cycle in all the phases of SDLC to ensure project completion within the allotted timelines & budget.
